tests.name: same -not palindrome
tests.output:
You entered the same words!
'Erin' is not palindrome.

tests.name: same -palindrome
tests.output:
You entered the same words!
'abba' is a palindrome!

tests.name: different -not palindrome
tests.output:
'Erin' is not palindrome.
'ErinKeith' is not palindrome.

tests.name: different -palindrome
tests.output:
'abba' is a palindrome!
'tacocat' is a palindrome!
